scripts.build: npm run build:js && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=build/app.js
scripts.start: npm run build:js && elm-live src/Main.elm --pushstate --hot --proxy-prefix /notebook-elm --proxy-host http://localhost:8000 -- --output=build/app.js
scripts.start:debug: npm run build:js && elm-live src/Main.elm --pushstate --hot --proxy-prefix /notebook-elm --proxy-host http://localhost:8000 -- --output=build/app.js --debug
